# Professional Services of a Design Approval Representative (DAR)

---

## Request for Proposal (RFP)

* **RFP Title (English):** Design Approval Representative (DAR) Services
* **RFP Title (French):** Services d'un délégué à l'approbation de conception (DAC)
* **Reference Number (English):** cb-537-71632518
* **Reference Number (French):** cb-537-71632518

## Procurement Details

* **Amendment Number (English):** 5
* **Solicitation Number (English):** T8563-230009
* **Publication Date:** December 1, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 16, 2024
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025

## Project Description

The Transport Canada's (TC) Engineering branch is seeking an experienced Design Approval Representative (DAR) to deliver technical services for the integration and certification of new Avionics, Electrical, and Mission systems on its aircraft fleet.

## Contract Period

The contract will be awarded for a period of one (1) year, with an option to extend for two (2) additional one-year periods.

## Selection Criteria

The evaluation will be based on a Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

## Contact Information

* **Name:** Tanya Nadeau
* **Email:** [tanya.nadeau@tc.gc.ca](mailto:tanya.nadeau@tc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** (343) 596-4353
* **Fax:** None

## Additional Info

* **Notice Type (English):** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Notice Type (French):** Demande de propositions (DP)
* **Procurement Method (English):** Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Procurement Method (French):** Concurrentielle – Appel d’offres sélectif
